snippet.title: Paper Zelda Trailer
snippet.description:
Welcome to Paper Zelda RPG! 

THIS IS A BETA VERSION AND NOT COMPLETE BY ANY MEANS. I am just building this for fun. If it gets enough support, I'll happily build it into a full game!


If you enjoyed the Paper Mario Games, this RPG will not disappoint. Play Zelda as a turn based RPG in 2.5D for the first time ever in this epic adventure being developed and released in early access for you to try! This game is FREE to play. (No Copyright infringement indented) Enjoy a fan made game that should have been created a long time ago! 



Battle Enemies and level up your character. Explore different areas to see new and familiar themes, characters, and sounds straight from your favorite Legend Of Zelda Games! Try it now for free! If you enjoy the concept of the game, consider donating to the developer for more updates and games in the future!

IF you wish to donate:

www.Paypal.me/JohnRoo

Feel free to check out my store and other projects here:

www.TheRetroRoomGames.com

Thanks so much for the support!

Custom pixels by @wtheskies

More information
